name: Agents
description:
I tried making an Divinity style shooter or Diablo, got the Controls almost there .  AI's are  a little dumb. ( kinda turned off their brains ) Will update soon with better AI. Enjoy the  music and have fun!!

Please do comment for any improvements and suggestions. 

100% coded by yours truly...

Music : mixkit.com  - no-turning-back-118

PLAY ON FULLSCREEN FOR BETTER CONTROLS
